resources.string: This app is a demo of an Android library called InAppDevTools.
InAppDevTools is a collection of tools for debugging, inspecting and reporting from within your own application... on the same screen!
InAppDevTools doesn\'t inspect/debug other installed apps. It only works with apps build with our library inside.
You can open our tools at any time by tapping our floating icon or shaking your device. We will pop up if your app crash
Try what will happen if your app crash
Browse some activities to generate data to inspect
Visit our GitHub repo for more info
